quotes.quote: Kindness is the only service that will stand the storm of life and not wash out.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Long Before being nerdy was cool, there was Leonard Nimoy
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: 99% of failures come from people who make excuses.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Whenever you do a thing, act as if all the world were watching.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: The advancement and diffusion of knowledge is the only guardian of true liberty.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: If tyranny and oppression come to this land it will be in the guise of fighting a foreign enemy.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: A little flattery will support a man through great fatigue
quotes.author: James Monroe

quotes.quote: Try and fail, but don’t fail to try.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: Any man worth his salt will stick up for what he believes right, but it takes a slightly better man to acknowledge instantly and without reservation that he is in error.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: It is easier to do a job right than to explain why you didn't.
quotes.author: Martin Van Buren

quotes.quote: There is nothing more corrupting, nothing more destructive of the noblest and finest feelings of our nature, than the exercise of unlimited power.
quotes.author: William Henry Harrison

quotes.quote: It is not strange… to mistake change for progress
quotes.author: Millard Fillmore

quotes.quote: You don’t know what you can miss before you try.
quotes.author: Franklin Pierce

quotes.quote: Leave nothing for tomorrow which can be done today.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I mean to make myself a man, and if I succeed in that, I shall succeed in everything else.
quotes.author: James Garfield

quotes.quote: Great lives never go out; they go on.
quotes.author: Benjamin Harrison

quotes.quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Be patient and calm; no one can catch a fish with anger.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: It's amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Testing oneself is best when done alone.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Live simply, love generously, care deeply, speak kindly, leave the rest to God.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: I have opinions of my own, strong opinions, but I don't always agree with them.
quotes.author: George H.W. Bush

quotes.quote: We all do better when we work together. Our differences do matter, but our common humanity matters more.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: A dictatorship would be a heck of a lot easier, there's no question about it.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: If you’re walking down the right path and you’re willing to keep walking, eventually you’ll make progress
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: When somebody challenges you, fight back. Be brutal, be tough.
quotes.author: Donald J Trump

quotes.quote: If I don't run for president, we'll all be OK.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time.
quotes.author: Barack Obama
